meanings.definition: A person responsible for maintaining a computer system.
meanings.sent1: The sysops fixed the server issue quickly.
meanings.sent2: Our company's sysops are always on top of any technical problems.
meanings.sent3: The sysops joked that they were the 'tech superheroes' of the office.
meanings.sent4: The sysops are the guardians of our digital realm.
meanings.sent5: I always feel relieved knowing the sysops are there to keep our systems running smoothly.

meanings.definition: The collective group of individuals responsible for managing a computer system.
meanings.sent1: The sysops meet every week to discuss system updates.
meanings.sent2: Our sysops team is highly skilled and efficient.
meanings.sent3: During the team-building exercise, the sysops showed off their impressive coordination.
meanings.sent4: The sysops work together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: I admire how the sysops collaborate seamlessly to ensure everything runs smoothly.
